channel.title: Posts on WardenSMP
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on WardenSMP

item.title: Welcome to the WardenSMP website!
item.description: WardenSMP is a Minecraft Java survival server with plenty to do! We are currently on the 2nd season and plan to add a lot of new, unique features! To join, you can join the discord or by emailing _A13x here: alexbogo2007@protonmail.com If you’d like, you can check out the WardenSMP Season 1 Recap
item.content:
WardenSMP is a Minecraft Java survival server with plenty to do! We are currently on the 2nd season and plan to add a lot of new, unique features! To join, you can join the discord or by emailing _A13x here: alexbogo2007@protonmail.com

If you’d like, you can check out the WardenSMP Season 1 Recap
